resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105502</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105502</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085928</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">From documents to digitization</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Von Dokumente zu Digital-Analog-Wandlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des documents à la numérotisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dos originais ao digitization</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dai documenti a digitalizzazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από τα έγγραφα στην ψηφιακή αναλογική μεταλλαγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">De documentos a la numeración</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">To design a research project using primary sources from the Web, you'll need to know what's out there and how to find it. This article explains what's available, why, and where.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Forschung Projekt mit Primärquellen vom Web 
konzipieren können, müssen Sie, was heraus dort und es finden ist. 
Dieser Artikel beschreibt, was vorhanden ist, warum und wo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour concevoir un projet de recherche en utilisant
des sources primaires du Web, vous devrez savoir ce qui est 
dehors là et le trouver. Cet article explique ce qui est 
disponible, pourquoi, et où.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para projetar um projeto de pesquisa usando fontes
preliminares do Web, você necessitará saber o que estão para fora 
lá e o encontrar. Este artigo explica o que estão disponível,
porque, e onde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per progettare un progetto di ricerca usando le 
sorgenti primarie dal Web, dovrete sapere che cosa è fuori là e 
trovarlo. Questo articolo spiega che cosa è disponibile, 
perchè e dove.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για να σχεδιάζετε ένα ερευνητικό πρόγραμμα που 
χρησιμοποιεί τις αρχικές πηγές από τον Ιστό, θα πρέπει να 
ξέρετε τι έξω εκεί και πώς να το βρεί. Αυτό το άρθρο 
εξηγεί ποιος διαθέσιμος, γιατί, και πού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para diseñar un proyecto de investigación usando
fuentes primarias del Web, usted necesitará saber cuál está 
hacia fuera allí y encontrarlo. Este artículo explica cuál 
está disponible, porqué, y donde.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DAVID WALBERT
FN:DAVID WALBERT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085928</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105502</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/from-documents-to-digitization</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
